subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN3739, how did it go?
description_text:
Hi Simsonn


I still haven't gotten my order for the upgraded brake kits....

Sent from my Bell Samsung device over Canada’s largest network.
________________________________
From: SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io>
Sent: Monday, December 22, 2025 2:46:53 PM
To: derek_ng1@hotmail.com <derek_ng1@hotmail.com>
Subject: Reminder: Order #SSN3739, how did it go?

conversations.body_text:
Good day Simsonn

Hope you had and joyful Christmas !

Just following up regarding my order for my upgraded brake kit. I still haven't received the product. Shipment says delivered but I still haven't received it. I think that shipment package was for the haptic but not brake kit.
Are you able assist me on that or can I get a refund for the brake kit that I didnt get ordered?

Sent from my Bell Samsung device over Canada’s largest network.
________________________________
Hi derek ng,  I can see that the upgrade kit has been delivered.

Hi Simsonn

I have checked and I have not receive the package..... what should I do ?

Sent from my Bell Samsung device over Canada’s largest network.
________________________________
